column12: Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1
column13: Sample_growth_protocol_ch1
column15: Sample_extract_protocol_ch1
column16: Sample_data_processing
column45: ATAC-seq reads were aligned to hg19 using Bowtie with the following parameters

column12: Media was changed 1 day prior to inductions and cells were treated with either DMSO (vehicle) or 10 nM (estradiol) E2 for 1 hour or 8 hours. For prolonged estrogen samples, wildtype cell lines were cultured in phenol-red free RPMI with 10% charcoal-dextran stripped fetal bovine serum and 1% pen-strep for up to 25 days. Cells were treated with 10 nM E2 every 2 days with media changes, and cell lysates were collected at the following time points: day 10, day 15, day 20, day 25.
column13: Ishikawa ESR1 LBD mutant and wildtype cells were cultured in full media: RPMI-1640 with 10% fetal bovine serum and 1% penicillin-streptomycin. Cells were incubated at 37°C with 5% CO2 for the duration of all experiments. At least 5 days prior to inductions, cells were placed in hormone deprived media: phenol-red free RPMI-1640 media (Thermo Fisher Scientific), since phenol-red is estrogenic, with 10% charcoal-dextran stripped fetal bovine serum (Thermo Fisher Scientific) and 1% penicillin-streptomycin.
column15: After treatments, cells were trypsinized and isolated by centrifugation., ATAC-seq was performed as originally described in Buenrostro et al. 2013
column16: Sam files were converted to bam files and sorted with Samtools., Macs2 was used to call peaks without an input control but with a p-value cutoff of 1*10-10., We used featureCounts from the Subread package in R to quantify reads that aligned to ATAC-seq peaks called ., Reads were normalized and analyzed for differential enrichment using the DESeq2 package for R.
